Qs:"it says that i have a bad module, friends.dll or something like that. please help!!"
Answer:DELETE ALL STEAM files THEN create a new dir. called "Steam" ,install PacSteam in it THEN install Steam.

Note:You must follow my instruction in order to get a steam account.
